AscMod:TestOfThePizza.NAME: Pronto Pepper Pizza
AscMod:TestOfThePizza.FLAVOR: Pizza can't melt LEGO bars...  or can it?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b

AscMod:JSpecialRelic.NAME: Pog Champ
AscMod:JSpecialRelic.FLAVOR: A very special relic for a very special person. Kappa
DESCRIPTIONS: We don't need to rest bois!

AscMod:CursedBank.NAME: Hungry Bank
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain gold lose #b15 % of the gold gained

AscMod:CursedFlame.NAME: Cursed Flame
AscMod:CursedFlame.FLAVOR: The flame lights the area with darkness, yet my vision is not impaired.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you open a boss chest obtain a random curse

AscMod:StarOfAscension.NAME: Star of Ascension
AscMod:StarOfAscension.FLAVOR: Where am I keeping this thing? And why?
DESCRIPTIONS: A star given to you by The Spire. It has an ominous feel to it.

AscMod:MegaStarOfAscension.NAME: Star of Ascension
AscMod:MegaStarOfAscension.FLAVOR: Where am I keeping this thing? And why?
DESCRIPTIONS: A star given to you by The Spire. It feels like it attracts evil.
